类的使用
io.sdchain.model.Amount

  • 使用Amount的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    io.sdchain.model  
    io.sdchain.util  

    • io.sdchain.model中Amount的使用

      返回Amount的io.sdchain.model中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Amount Transaction.getAmount()
      Get transaction amount
      Amount PaymentOperation.getAmount()
      Get payment amount
      Amount Payment.getAmount()
      Get payment amount
      Amount Effect.getAmount()
      For trust_change_balance, balance_change
      Amount OrderBook.getAmountPrice()
      Get base currency price as Amount object
      Amount Payment.getDestinationAmount()
      Get destination amount info in finding payment path
      Amount Effect.getFrom()
      For trust_change_local, trust_change_remote
      Amount Transaction.getGets()
      Order gets
      Amount Effect.getGets()
      For offer_funded, offer_cancelled, offer_created, get "get" currency amount
      Amount Effect.getGot()
      For offer_bought, get got amount
      Amount Effect.getLimit()
      For trust_create_local, get amount trusted
      Amount Effect.getPaid()
      For offer_bought, get paid amount
      Amount Order.getPay()
      Get amount pays in the order
      Amount Transaction.getPays()
      Order pays
      Amount Effect.getPays()
      For offer_funded, offer_cancelled, offer_created, get pays currency amount
      Amount Order.getReceive()
      Get amount receive depends on the type of order
      Amount Payment.getSourceAmount()
      Get source payment needed in finding payment path
      Amount OrderBook.getTaker_gets_funded()
      Get actual amount get
      Amount OrderBook.getTaker_gets_total()
      Get total amount get
      Amount OrderBook.getTaker_pays_funded()
      Get actual amount pay
      Amount OrderBook.getTaker_pays_total()
      Get total amount pay
      Amount Effect.getTo()
      For trust_change_local, trust_change_remote
      参数类型为Amount的io.sdchain.model中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      OrderBookResult Wallet.getOrderBook(Amount base, Amount counter) 
      PaymentCollection Wallet.getPathList(java.lang.String receiver, Amount amount)
      Get payment available payment path

      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Return the Tum pair string from the input base and counter Amount objects
